attributes.action: Stop Deforestation and Save the animals.Start Afforestation.
attributes.additional_details:
10 species are wiped out every day.Every second 1 acre and a half of trees is destroyed.Animals lose their habitat just for paper and palm oil.
50% of our food contains palm oil.In 100 years there may be no more rainforest. We are the first generation to know about this and could be the last to do anything about it
attributes.background: Iceland (the food store) made an advert about the impacts of deforestation and us planting palm oil.It was shut down and banned from the TV as companies did't want us citizens to know the truth.After the advert was shut down Iceland pledged for all there food to never contain palm oil.

rejection.details:
We understand you are concerned about deforestation but we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You might like to sign this petition about palm oil:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/233012

Or start a new petition for the UK Government to push for greater protection of rain-forests internationally.
